title.rendered: Financial Commission Participating in Finance Magnates London Summit

content.rendered:
Come See our Exhibitor Booth 86 at Finance Magnates London Summit this November

The Financial Commission will be exhibiting at the 2015 Finance Magnates London Summit which will take place at the Brewery on Chiswell Street during November 2nd and 3rd.

The organization joins a list of 77 confirmed exhibitors and representatives from hundreds of financial services providers expected to attend the exclusive industry gathering.

The Importance of Industry Events:

The announcement follows prior events that the Financial Commission participated in including in Russia, Turkey and Cyprus.

Participation in the Finance Magnates London event supports the industry and provides market participants with the chance to learn more about how the Financial Commission operates.

This includes how the organization is helping its members improve the services they offer to clients using a 3rd party dispute resolution process afforded via membership status within the Financial Commission.

  • The London summit will feature unique networking opportunities, focused panel discussions, and a diverse range of exhibitors from the financial services space.

  • There will be top executives of the leading Forex and FinTech firms in Europe and across the world

  • The event supports various aspects of the financial services space in foreign exchange and related markets through various collaborative means.

  • The Financial Commission will demonstrate its value to participants through its exhibitor booth 86 where representatives from the organization will explain the benefits provided by membership with the Financial Commission.

In addition, the Financial Commission expects to meet new market participants who could be potential candidate member firms, including Forex, Binary Options and Cryptocurrency related brokerages and technology developers.
